oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Handwritten on back of photograph: "unident, unident, unident, unident, Nancy Hauser, Henrietta Greenhood (Eve Gentry Brooks), Carolyn Durand, (Brooks) Hanya Holm's group Dance of Work and Play photo by Marshall Brooks."

Carolyn Durand (later Carolyn Durand Brooks), Henrietta Greenhood (professionally known as Eve Brooks), and Nancy Hauser (left to right, front row) perform "Dance of Work and Play," choreographed by Hanya Holm, at Bennington College in Bennington, Vermont.
